content: sew the cast on edge onto the top of the head © copyright 2021 cilla webb - cilla s purls arms make two using dk yarn cast on 14 sts row 1-6 st st 6 row row 7 k2tog 7 times 7 sts break yarn and thread through rem sts pull tight and fasten using mattress st sew along the side seam and secure to the body legs make two using dk yarn cast on 16 sts row 1-6 st st 6 row row 7 k2tog 8 times 8 sts break yarn and thread through rem sts pull tight and fasten using mattress st sew along the side seam and secure to the body thank you for downloading my pattern i hope you will enjoy knitting your very own bunny buddies © copyright 2021 cilla webb - cilla s purls
